article.Heading: 'EPF rollback, a victory for common people': Mamata Banerjee
article.Summary: Mamata Banerjee statement came soon after union Finance Minister Arun Jaitley withdrew his Budget proposal to tax employees' provident fund (EPF) at withdrawal.
article.Body:
West Bengal chief minister Mamata Banerjee today said that EPF rollback was a "victory for the common people".

"EPFRollBack A victory for the common people. Happy that we were the first to raise this issue. Good," she tweeted.

Mamata Banerjee statement came soon after union Finance Minister Arun Jaitley withdrew his Budget proposal to tax employees' provident fund (EPF) at withdrawal.
